/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene on a highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the road below. The highway is teeming with cars and trucks, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a hazy blue, suggesting either early morning or late afternoon. The surrounding landscape is dotted with trees and buildings, adding to the urban feel of the scene.
